Synchronous TCP/IP Library for Delphi

Reference list of Synapse

Here is reference list of Synapse. If you create project based on my Synapse, please write me about it. It is good for:

  • my feedback...
  • your propagation...
  • my propagation...
Thank's.
Project: N/A
Contact: www.ararat.cz
Description: Lot of programs like MIME antivirus scanner, time synchronizing software, TCP proxy with bandwidth limit, UDP proxy, e-mail server, etc.
Project: Kompakt ZOLL
Contact: www.vamszoft.hu
Description: Our (Vamszoft) Kompakt ZOLL v5 product is a 3-tier customs software that use Synapse in the middle tier as TCP server (listening socket in one thread and clients in different threads). The server provides an own RPC over Synapse (HTTP transport layer, RPC request/responses are embedded into MIME 'multipart/related' content, the MIME processor is our own) and also acts as a HTTP server (built from TCP level)
Project: Traffic Counter 1.30
Contact: www.popronconsulting.cz
Description: People traffic monitoring through company gateways. It communicate with special gateway device by SynaSer. This non-visual NT service uses simple command for control device and collecting datas.
Project: SetiHTML
Contact: www.htmlvakwerk.nl/seti/setihtml.zip
Description: It's used to collect statistics about one's progress with the Seti@Home client. It puts these statistics in a HTML file and, optionally, uploads this file to a FTP-server.
Project: AutoPOP
Contact: nicoaragon.com
Description: autopop is a pop3 robot. It can be used as notifier, or to delete spam based on headers inspection. Mail list management features are also projected. Autopop still hasn't a decent UI. But it's free software and new versions will be released soon.
Project: Time Memo
Contact: www.astrosurf.com/astropc/timememo/
Description: Periodically control the time offset between your computer and a NTP server, it can eventually adjust the computer clock. I do this software with astronomical observation in meant but there is certainly other usage. Windows and Linux version.
Project: Electronic Registry
Contact: www.triada.cz
Description: Module of Electronic Registry through e-mail for neighbourhood information system.
